title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing Finish, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: After pressing Finish in the JAR packager, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
EB: To create a JAR file with unsaved editors, I should be able to save the unsaved files without quitting the wizard. If saving is not possible, there should be a dialog prompting me to save the files before proceeding with the JAR creation process.
SR:
1. Open a file and make some edits without saving.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project.
3. Enter the necessary details such as path, destination, name of the JAR packager, and description.
4. Attempt to create the JAR without saving the unsaved file.
